sentences.en: A: I really want to extend a heartfelt welcome to you.
sentences.cn: 我对您的到来致以真诚的欢迎.

sentences.en: Besides, giving up on a heartfelt aspiration is worse than failing.
sentences.cn: 而且, 放弃自己内心深处的渴望要比失败更糟糕.

sentences.en: Friends know when to offer serious counsel and thoughtful heartfelt advice.
sentences.cn: 朋友知道什么时候应该给予我们忠告和经过深思熟虑的,贴心的建议.

sentences.en: Heartfelt smile is the powerful weapon that breaks the ice.
sentences.cn: 真诚的微笑是打破僵局最强有力的武器.

sentences.en: I give my heartfelt thanks to those who have helped me.
sentences.cn: 对帮助过我的人们给予诚挚的感谢.

sentences.en: I want to express heartfelt congratulations to you on your seventeenth birthday.
sentences.cn: 你过十七岁生日,我要向你表示衷心的祝贺之意.

sentences.en: Just hear of your great affliction please accept my heartfelt sympathy.
sentences.cn: 刚刚得知你遭不幸,谨此深表同情.

sentences.en: My heartfelt sympathy goes out to all the relatives.
sentences.cn: 我对所有的亲人表示由衷的慰问。

sentences.en: She gave him her heartfelt thanks.
sentences.cn: 她向他表示衷心的感谢.

sentences.en: She heaved a deep , heartfelt sigh.
sentences.cn: 她发了一声深长的 、 真心的叹息.

sentences.en: There was surely in it a quality that was personal and heartfelt.
sentences.cn: 其中确实有一种出自心底的个人因素.

sentences.en: Therefore , we published all their kind contributions to show our heartfelt thanks.
sentences.cn: 我们在这里集中刊出,并对各位专家表示衷心的感谢.

sentences.en: We would like to take this opportunity to convey our heartfelt condolences to the families of the victims.
sentences.cn: 我们谨此向受害人家属表达我们衷心的慰唁.

sentences.en: With heartfelt sympathy and understanding thoughts in this time of sadness.
sentences.cn: 在这悲恸的时刻,谨致诚挚的同情和深切的慰问.

sentences.en: Words can t express my heartfelt thanks for your gracious hospitality.
sentences.cn: 语言不足以表达我对你们亲切款待的由衷感激之情.

trans.tran_cn: 衷心的，诚挚的，真诚的，深切
